Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to developing a comprehensive program for the remediation and reuse of brownfields.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Developing a comprehensive program for the remediation and reuse of brownfields.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and New York State Legislature to execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 New York State Brownfield Cleanup Program and distribution of funding through the Brownfield Opportunity Areas Program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 NYS Brownfield Cleanup Program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tax lien foreclosure by action in rem for properties where the redevelopment or reuse of which may be complicated by the presence or potential presence of contamination.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Tax lien foreclosure by action in rem for properties.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to developing a comprehensive program for the remediation and reuse of brownfields.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Developing a comprehensive program for the remediation and reuse of brownfields.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tax lien foreclosure by action in rem for properties where the redevelopment or reuse of which may be complicated by the presence or potential presence of contamination.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Tax lien foreclosure by action in rem for properties.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and New York State Legislature to execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 New York State Brownfield Cleanup Program and distribution of funding through the Brownfield Opportunity Areas Program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 NYS Brownfield Cleanup Program.
